subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tyson Chandler, a top defensive center acquired in a three-team deal, joins Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire to form one of the best frontcourts in the N.B.A.
snippet: Tyson Chandler, a top defensive center acquired in a three-team deal, joins Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire to form one of the best frontcourts in the N.B.A.
